data.name: Yogurt!
data.detailed_description:
NEW GAME!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1986550/LOLLIPOP_SUMMER/


NEW GAME!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1874720/Elf_World_Adventure_Part_1/


NEW GAME!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1891640/AZUR_BEAM/


NEW GAME

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1900930/DANGO/


About the Game

NEW awesome clicker - “YOGURT!”


“YOGURT!”- is an enjoyable animated game that loads a lot of pictures of girls that you must collect! This game shows off some incredible graphics and is really addictive!

“YOGURT!” is a clicker, with many beautiful girls in different poses. In the game there will be many hentai pictures fallin and you should click on all of them. “Yogurt!” will be shaping up to be one of the best animated games! So, let us tell you more about this awesome game!
There are two modes - “NORMAL” and “FREE” mode.

In “NORMAL” mode: you can unlock new hot images and
animations of girls.
In “FREE” mode: you can endlessly complete levels with any girl.

What you can find in the game:


• Beautiful pictures and animations of girls.

• Girls will show reactions whenever you click on them.

• Incredible sound and visual effects.

• 2 modes: “Normal” and “Free”.

• Gallery with hot pictures of girls, that will be available in “Normal” mode.

• In “Free” mode you can endlessly complete levels with any girl.

The name of the item in the Store does not give any visual effect; it is just a few improvements for clicks.
Outstanding graphical design, hot girls, easy to play!
What else can one need for a great gaming experience?
If you love hot animated girls, than“YOGURT!” is mean for you, now hurry up, begin your adventure by unlocking new scenes and enjoy this beautiful game!

picture artist https://twitter.com/__Ja__ga__imo__

data.supported_languages:
English*, Russian*, Japanese*, Swedish*, Simplified Chinese*, German*, Korean*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WINDOWS® 7 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 Serise or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 500 Series or AMD Radeon™ HD6000 Series (VRAM 1GB) or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX® 9.0c)
  • Additional Notes: This requirements are not final
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: WINDOWS® 7 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 Serise or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 500 Series or AMD Radeon™ HD6000 Series (VRAM 1GB) or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX® 9.0c)
  • Additional Notes: This requirements are not final

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content
